Posts.Content: Nsho4 wrote: hello! I have gone through the sticky posts, and haven't found info on this question by browsing. Could not find a way to search via mobile. Sorry if I missed it. Anyway, has anyone heard of "wavy" skin? It's not dimples as I've seen on pics of others, but longer slightly raised lines. I have them on the inner half of each breast. More pronounced on left. Approximately 1/3 of left and 1/5 of right breast affected. 31 yrs old, no sisters or daughters. Mom clear. aunt had bc. Anyone heard of this? It seems to co Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Wavy? Nsho4 Nsho4

Posts.Content: Oct 7, 2017 09:07AM Nsho4 wrote: Good question! No. I'm at 26% BMI so overweight (over 25% is overweight). I've been within 10 lbs of this, plus or minus, for 5+ yrs. I'm going to try drinking a ton of water today and see if they recede. I wonder if it has to do with dehydration, although I have not noticed this trend. It has been noticeable to me and then apparently goes away as I don't notice it, but I haven't been tracking it to see if it goes along with my hormone cycle or anything.
